description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows Layer-2 Bridge Network Driver Denial of Service Vulnerability (CVE-2024-38145), apply the relevant updates as follows:

1. Identify your Windows version and architecture.
2. Download the correct update package from the provided links below.
3. Install the updates to incorporate security improvements and mitigate the vulnerability.
4. Restart your system to ensure that the updates take effect.

**Details**:
- Relevant KB Article IDs include KB5041592, KB5041585, KB5041580, and KB5041571 for the various Windows versions.
- Update packages are available at the following links:
  - [KB5041782](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041782)
  - [KB5041585](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041585)
  - [KB5041580](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041580)
  - [KB5041571](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041571)
  - [KB5041592](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041592)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure you are running one of the following Windows builds:
  - Windows 11 Version 24H2 for x64-based Systems
  - Windows 11 Version 23H2 for x64-based Systems
  - Windows 11 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems
  - Windows 11 Version 21H2 for x64-based Systems
  - Windows 10 for x64-based Systems
  - Windows 10 for 32-bit Systems
